txt.en: You rescued Agela, a mother devastated by the loss of her family, from Thornhope, but the woman is nearly hysterical with grief.
Agela weeps for her losses: a husband and daughter and son. Perhaps there are some remnants of their belongings which you might bring her to help her deal with her grief.
There may be remnants of Agela's family's belongings near her home in Thornhope.\n\nYou should search for items once belonging to Agela's family. They might help her deal with her grief.

Agela sobs, but pauses her weeping long enough to take her family's belongings from you. She looks at you in surprise.\n\n'Th-thank you, stranger. These... these belonged to my... husband and children. My thanks to you....'
Agela is encamped outside the walls of Thornhope.\n\nYou should bring the items you found to Agela.
Agela weeps, mourning the loss of her husband and children....
